entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 8 blazor web with RenderModeServer Issues with CascadingAuthenticationState #50951
  • source-building: restore.cmd not working properly (Microsoft.DotNet.Arcade.Sdk not found) #50950
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #50948
  • Blazor Server authentication documentation is all over the place #50947
  • Enhanced form submit to a different internal URL doesn't update browser location #50945
    8.0
  • The client has disconnected Inner Exception - System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException 0x80070040 The specified network name is no longer available #50944
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer 7.0.11 requires >= 7.0.0 of Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.OpenIdConnect #50943
  • Output cache: serve cached response if request fails #50942
  • how to implement external login provders(linkedin) login using .net core with openidconnect? #50941
  • ThrowTargetParameterCountException raised when running my .NET WebAPI #50940
  • Blazor javascript isolation in different assembly #50939
  • SignalR C++ client #50938
  • Improve UX for creating a Blazor Web App when selecting None for the interactivity type #50932
  • Hot reload doesn't work with the empty Blazor Web App template #50931
    8.0

Closed

  • Perf improvement: single_query #50934
  • Perf regression: endpoint, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #50935
  • AspNetCore.App runtime 6.0.21 uninstalls version 6.0.20 #50827
  • Blazor forms with @formname set from Razor expressions cannot be submitted #50882
  • octet-streams in Blazor Server via long-polling are not compressed #50895
  • SVG mouse events not working on Visual Studio 17.8.0 Preview 2.0 (.NET 8) #50896
  • Add empty option for the Blazor Web App template #48913
    .NET 9 Planning
  • New Blazor Web App fails to compile: Auto, Global, Empty #50930
    8.0-rc2
  • Dictionary model binding behaves different with Enum as Key vs Value #50748
    9.0-preview1
  • Css Isolation is broken in Blazor + Client #50937
  • Perf regression: fortunes #50922
  • Option to use HeadOutlet (or any outlet) more than once ? #50933

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50952
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Update SDK to 9.0.100-alpha.1.23476.6 #50949
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Antiforgery fix #50946
    area-blazor

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50919
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 9.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `d1467f5` to `80306a7` #50876
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Update IAcceptsMetadata docs to reflect behavior of matcher policy #50747
    Docs, area-minimal, 9.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc2' => 'release/8.0' #50845
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Capture parsing errors in model state when binding convertible keys #50929
    area-mvc, feature-model-binding, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Replace ''return'' with lambda expression ''=>''. #50711
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/8.0-rc2] [Blazor] Improvements to SSR component activation #50848
    area-blazor
  • Update Versions.props to latest Microsoft.Identity.Web 2.13.4 #50594
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Initializers fixes for Blazor Web #50860
    area-blazor
  • Auth with global interactivity #50920
    area-mvc
